main event: A UFO sighting involving a giant fireball was reported over California on January 16, 1961, causing excitement and near-panic among residents.
interesting points: The object was shaped like a football and exhibited blue-green iridescent colors,It descended towards the horizon in 15 seconds, trailing a long fiery tail,The sighting was reported by thousands, including police and media outlets,The UFO was visible for about 20 seconds and trailed a brilliantly-colored tail, Pieces of metal debris were found in various locations following the event.
witness description: Thousands of residents witnessed the object, including credible observers such as police.
